email_group_1.subject: Important Update on Benefits Enrollment
email_group_1.desc:
Dear Employee,

We are reaching out to inform you about an important update regarding your benefits enrollment. It is crucial that you review the attached document to ensure that you are aware of the new changes that will take effect next month.

Please download the attachment and follow the instructions carefully. Failure to do so may result in a lapse of your benefits coverage. If you have any questions, do not hesitate to contact us.

Best regards,
HR Team
email_group_1.explain: This email is phishing because it contains an executable attachment that could install malware. Legitimate emails would not ask you to download such files.

email_group_1.subject: Important Update on Benefits Enrollment
email_group_1.desc:
Dear Employee,

We are reaching out to inform you about an important update regarding your benefits enrollment. It is crucial that you review the attached document to ensure that you are aware of the new changes that will take effect next month.

Please download the attachment and follow the instructions carefully. If you have any questions, do not hesitate to contact us.

email_group_1.explain: This email is safe because it contains a legitimate PDF attachment and does not ask for sensitive information or contain any red flags.

email_group_2.subject: Urgent: Action Required for Payroll Update
email_group_2.desc:
Hi Team,

We have detected an issue with your payroll information that requires your immediate attention. Please find the attached document that outlines the necessary steps you need to take to correct this issue.

Failure to respond promptly may result in a delay in your next paycheck. Download the attachment and follow the instructions carefully.

Thank you,
Payroll Department
email_group_2.explain: This email is phishing because it uses urgent language and includes an executable attachment, which is suspicious and could harm your computer.

email_group_2.subject: Payroll Update Notification
email_group_2.desc:

email_group_2.explain: This email is safe as it contains a legitimate PDF attachment and does not contain any urgent requests or suspicious elements.

email_group_3.subject: Security Alert: Immediate Action Required

email_group_3.explain: This email is phishing because it contains an executable attachment and uses threatening language to create a sense of urgency.

email_group_3.subject: Security Update Notification

email_group_3.explain: This email is safe as it contains a legitimate PDF attachment and does not pressure the recipient into taking immediate action.

email_group_4.subject: New Training Session: Immediate Registration Required
email_group_4.desc:

Thank you,
Training Department
email_group_4.explain: This email is phishing because it includes an executable attachment and creates a false sense of urgency for registration.
